title: National Parks of New York Harbor: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends       Our Friends are made up by a group of different organizations who have official agreements with the National Park Service. Some of our Friends help us with all of our National Parks in the New York City-New Jersey Metropolitan Area and some help us with specific parks. National Park Foundation National Parks of New York Harbor Conservancy African American Experience Fund (African Burial Ground) African Burial Ground Monument Foundation Friends of Gateway (Gateway National Recreation Area) Governors Island Preservation and Education Corporation (Governors Island National Monument) Sandy Hook Foundation (Sandy Hook unit of Gateway NRA) Save Ellis Island Society of the National Shrine of the Bill of Rights (St. Paul's Church NHS). For contact information, call (914) 667-4116. Statue of Liberty and Ellis Island Foundation, Inc. Theodore Roosevelt Association (Theodore Roosevelt Birthplace NHS) You can learn more about our partners by clicking on links to their web sites.
